profile.company_size: 2 core team members (sole proprietor LLC with contractors as needed)

business_context.company_focus: Quality systems consulting, cybersecurity compliance, and data analytics solutions for manufacturing and industrial clients
core_expertise: ISO family standards implementation (9001, 13485, AS9001, automotive, environmental)
CMMC cybersecurity compliance for aerospace/automotive supply chain
Manufacturing data analytics and business intelligence
service_delivery_model: Excel-based dashboards deployed as read-only web applications
Node.js applications for advanced reporting flexibility
client_industries: Aerospace and defense contractors (2nd/3rd tier suppliers)
Range from 2-person operations to multi-billion dollar companies
competitive_advantages: 25+ years UL experience in safety standards and regulatory engineering
Established first ISO9001 quality registrar in United States
Audited thousands of companies across virtually every industry
Deep understanding of how companies work and fail
Unique ability to leverage existing quality systems for CMMC compliance (~1/3 overlap)
Technology integration expertise with quality systems knowledge
key_systems: MS Teams for client collaboration and solution deployment
business_priorities: Advanced data analytics and AI-driven insights
Scaling technology solutions across client base
Continuous learning and adoption of new automation tools
pain_points: Guest user access limitations in Teams environments
Scaling custom solutions across diverse client needs
Managing complex data connectivity across multiple client systems

access_constraints: Read-only Excel access for many users

team_structure.name: Owner (Chemical Engineer, 25+ years UL experience)
team_structure.role: Technical lead, strategy, client relations, all project implementation
